SELECT COUNT(1) FROM( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_borrow_apply t
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.applyTime, #{datePattern})) tab

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_borrow_apply t
GROUP BY t.cityName, DATE_FORMAT(t.applyTime, #{datePattern})) tab

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_borrow_apply t LEFT JOIN t_borrow_channel t1 ON t.channelCode = t1.channelCode LEFT JOIN t_borrow_team team ON t1.teamNo = team.teamNo
GROUP BY t.channelCode, DATE_FORMAT(t.applyTime, #{datePattern})) tab

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.applyTime, #{datePattern}) AS applyTime, t.cityName, count(CASE WHEN t.grade='A' THEN 1 END) AS A , count(CASE WHEN t.grade='B' THEN 1 END) AS B , count(CASE WHEN t.grade='C' THEN 1 END) AS C , count(CASE WHEN t.grade='D' THEN 1 END) AS D , count(CASE WHEN t.grade='E' THEN 1 END) AS E , count(CASE WHEN t.grade='F' THEN 1 END) AS F , count(CASE WHEN t.allotFlag=1 THEN 1 END) AS netSales, count(CASE WHEN t.allotFlag=2 THEN 1 END) AS loanShop, count(CASE WHEN t.allotFlag=3 THEN 1 END) AS electSales, count(CASE WHEN t.allotFlag=4 THEN 1 END) AS custService, count(CASE WHEN t.allotFlag=5 THEN 1 END) AS smallLoan, count(CASE WHEN t.allotFlag=6 THEN 1 END) AS insurance, count(CASE WHEN t.allotFlag=7 THEN 1 END) AS smallLoan_insurance FROM t_borrow_apply t
GROUP BY t.cityName, DATE_FORMAT(t.applyTime, #{datePattern}) ORDER BY applyTime DESC

GROUP BY t.channelCode, DATE_FORMAT(t.applyTime, #{datePattern}) ORDER BY applyTime DESC
